channel.title: RSC PKing - Kingpk is Online here!
channel.description:
Do you miss Pking? Did You miss KingPk? RSC PKing is the New Name! The most fun I have had since 2005 honestly. I will work on whatever suggestions come along and that could better the server.
[b] This game right now is strictly kingpk.. the fun rsc pking server we all knew.[/b] This is the Best Pking Server Alive. Website -[url=http://rscpking.sytes.net]RSC Pking Website[/url] IRC Chat -[url=http://webchat.quakenet.org/?channels=rscpking&uio=d4]RSC Pking Chat[/url]
[b]Server:[/b] This is a f2p high exp rate server. The max stat is[b] 99[/b]. There is no Skilling at the moment, but could come later. The main focus is pking right now. When first logging on you may think that it is hard to get stuff, but let me assure you it is quite simple. To help out everything you kill will drop coins, 9 man drops steel 2h's zombies drop mith 2h's collecting these and selling to the store add up quick! Also, the Master Fisher will give free loads of cooked swordfish that can be sold to general store for quick starting cash. Once gained some levels and you start killing lessers or get ranged skill to range dragons then you will see you will have full rune r2h and then some in no time!!
[u][i]Few commands[/i][/u]
::stuck :: dm - death match area ::dmover- lets u leave ::dragons- sends u to lvl 29? wild where dragons are ::say - Global chat command to send everyone on server a message. ::edge - can be used while in wild if you stand still for 15 seconds. ::tired - gets u 100 fatigue ::castle takes u to castle ::runerox take u to the rune rockz there is now a 45 second delay on wild commands.. meaning if u just used a command u gotta wait 45 seconds.. still normal wait time 10 - 15 seconds to use them just a delay to stop people from coming right back ( u can re log if u wish but.. wont by pass command)
[u][i]NPC's[/i][/u] Chickens - Edge Men - Edge, and in Wild Guards- Edge and in Wild Skeletons - under castle lvl 48 hobs- above castle in old bandant place red spiders ::runeroxs old rune rocks from real rsc Zombies- Edge Zombies- under ::dragons old zombie place in wild from rsc Hobgoblins- Across bridge in edge Giants- Near edge Axes- lvl 43 wild. go to ::Dragons walk north until about level 42 then west. Baby Blue dragons- Wild and way over on other side of moutain where Black knights fortress was Fire Giants- Directly North from ::dragons about lvl 35 wild then east some. Lesser demons- Old lvl 13 prayer hut above varrock wild Greater demons- Same as above, Old prayer hut lvl 13 wild Red, Blue, and King Black dragons :: dragons. ( in wild be aware) Soldiers- Edge dungeon Black Knights- Edge dungeon Ice Spiders - Edge dungeon Ice Giant - Edge dungeon Guard Dog- Behind edge bank by ladder to dungeon
To log on you will need to make a forum account at [url=http://rscpking.sytes.net]RSC Pking[/url], Then go to Your Profile page>Character Management>clickhere at the top. Thanks Guys we will see you soon on RSC Pking! -Matt
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s18.postimg.org/t9o5c28u1/screenshot2.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s18.postimg.org/y4huac75l/screenshot4.png[/img][/url] http://youtu.be/naBXJcrwRPA

item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

Should this server come back with all the bugs worked out and all monsters around the world. When it made a comeback for a couple weeks it was very popular, the only thing needed was having glitches and bugs fixed. Im thinking it would be popular for everyone give king pk another shot!!!

item.title: RSC PKing - Kingpk is Online here!
item.dc:creator: @lil_devil420 lil devil420
item.description:
@lil_devil420 wrote:

[quote=“fran ta the brah, post:77, topic:534285”][quote author=Godandjesus link=topic=653080.msg4388346#msg4388346 date=1386526614]
^ no active development, no economy, no pking
[/quote]
ur jking right emu is basically a pk server with economy nonstop pking tell me u can stay at cas for 5 mins without being attacked then say no pking u might need a team but thats it[/quote]

I’m sorry your right. and wrong.

I started playing a few months ago. Had none of my existing chars or stuff. Went from nothing to 80mil blue p hat enough pking supplys to last forever.

Economy is fucked. simply as that. drop rates are will not rsc enough for me.

Lets see here pking sucks balls. 6-12 man teams. So if your new chances of getting a team are slim/if not they will BS you. for pixels I already have enough of because the economy sucks.

So after about 4 weeks into playing i quit again because RSCE BLOWS

Read full topic
